title: Chicago schools push forward with reopening plan despite teachers union, city council objections
content:
1. Chicago schools push forward with reopening plan despite teachers union, city council objections  Fox News
  2. With some CPS teachers set to return to classrooms, union members say schools are not safe enough  WGN News
  3. Daywatch: Some CPS teachers won’t return to schools, Bears back into the playoffs and old railroad corridors transformed into trails  Chicago Tribune
  4. CTU Says Some Teachers Will Not Return To School Monday  CBS Chicago
  5. When will teachers get vaccinated? Some already have — but most are nervously waiting.  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Chicago schools push forward with reopening plan despite teachers union, city council objections  Fox News
With some CPS teachers set to return to classrooms, union members say schools are not safe enough  WGN News
Daywatch: Some CPS teachers won’t return to schools, Bears back into the playoffs and old railroad corridors transformed into trails  Chicago Tribune
CTU Says Some Teachers Will Not Return To School Monday  CBS Chicago
When will teachers get vaccinated? Some already have — but most are nervously waiting.  The Washington Post
